document.heading: District of Columbia Renters and Homeowners Tax Reduction Act of 1978

history.narrative: Law 2-130, the “District of Columbia Renters and Homeowners Tax Reduction Act of 1978,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 2-318, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 27, 1978 and July 25, 1978, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on August 30, 1978, it was assigned Act No. 2-268 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
